name: Demon Together
description:
Core mechanism

The infection of the tentacles is the continuous power of the tentacle demons. Many demon followers gather together to summon powerful tentacle demons to destroy the world. You need to purify and summon the pillars before the demon believers gather, and then destroy them

The goals of the game

Clean up hordes of infected creatures, defeat demons, and eliminate virus sources

Desgin concept

Isolating the enemy will make the target exponentially weaker, you may win, and at the same time save the mutant

Participated in Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1
7 days of production, the game is far from complete

&
